**Location:** ??

5721.title: Painting
5721.template:

**Reward:** ??  

After interacting with the painting, go to the Reward's location and interact with the ghost. This ghost will not spawn until you have interacted with the painting.

5728.title: Spellbook
5728.template:
**Location:** ??  
**Utility:** Bring to ?? or ?? to unlock the following ??:
- ??

5726.title: Talisman Pouch
5726.template:
**Location:** ??  
**Utility:** Increases the number of talismans you can carry.

5677.title: Crystal Tear
5677.info: **How to use:** At any Site of Grace, combine with another Crystal Tear in the [Flask of Wondrous Physique](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164723). Lasts for 3 minutes unless otherwise noted.

5679.title: Larval Tear
5679.info: **Utility:** Trade to [Rennala](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165895) to gain rebirth and reallocate attribute points.

5724.title: Rune Arc
5724.template:
**Location:** ??  
**Utility:** Consume to activate a Great Rune's power. Lasts until you die.

5678.title: Sacred Tear
5678.info: **Utility:** Consume at a Site of Grace to upgrade the Flask of Crimson Tears and the Flask of Cerulean Tears.

5687.title: Spirit Ashes
5687.info:
**Spirit Ashes** are summonable companions, that can aid the player in combat. After receiving the [Spirit Calling Bell](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167800), the player may summon any acquired Spirit Ash by paying its cost when in range of a Rebirth Monument.

After completing Roderika's Task, [Roderika](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170232) can upgrade any Spirit Ash with the corresponding upgrade material, up to +10.

5702.title: Glovewort
5702.info:
**Utility:** Give to [Roderika](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170232) to upgrade Spirit Ashes.  
- A Grave Glovewort [X] upgrades a standard Spirit Ash to +X.
- A Ghost Glovewort [X] upgrades an elite Spirit Ash to +X.

locations.title: Church of Dragon Communion
locations.description:
**Location:** Accessible via the [Coastal Cave](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164031). After defeating the [Demi-Human Chiefs](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164457) - follow the tunnel behind them all the way and exit on the island.  
**Utility:** Learn new Dragon Communion incantations in exchange for Dragon Hearts.
**Inventory:**
- [Dragonclaw](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169241) @ 1 DH
- [Dragonfire](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169245) @ 1 DH
- [Dragonmaw](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169240) @ 1 DH

locations.title: Cathedral of Dragon Communion
locations.description:
**Location:** In southern Caelid, at the end of the road.  
**Utility:** Learn new Dragon Communion incantations in exchange for Dragon Hearts.  
**Inventory:**
- [Dragonclaw](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169241) @ 1 DH
- [Dragonfire](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169245) @ 1 DH
- [Dragonclaw](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169241) @ 1 DH
- [Glintstone Breath](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169244) @ 1 DH
- [Rotten Breath](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169243) @ 1 DH
- [Dragonice](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169242) @ 1 DH

In addition, defeat the following bosses to unlock their respective incantations:
- [Flying Dragon Agheel](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164484): [Agheel's Flame](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169239) @ 2 DH
- [Magma Wyrm](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167222): [Magma Breath](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169238) @ 1 DH
- [Great Wyrm Theodorix](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168186): [Theodorix's Magma](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169237) @ 2 DH
- [Glintstone Dragon Smarag](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165267): [Smarag's Glintstone Breath](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169236) @ 2 DH
- [Decaying Ekzykes](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165933): [Ekzykes's Decay](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169235) @ 2 DH
- [Borealis the Freezing Fog](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165642): [Borealis's Mist](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169234) @ 2 DH
- [Elder Dragon Greyoll](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166189): [Greyoll's Roar](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169246) @ 3 DH

**Location:** At the top of the manor, in the opposite direction of the throne room. Need two Stonesword Keys.

- Seedbed Curse
- [Ash of War: Royal Knight’s Resolve](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=175136)
- Somber Smithing Stone [7]
- [Dagger Talisman](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=171764)
- Rune Arc

locations.description: The second Imp Statue Seal at **Roundtable Hold** will require 2 more Stonesword Keys (for a total of 3 in this area), and will award you the Assassin's Prayerbook once you open up the second door.

locations.title: Imp Seal Statue
locations.description: **The Four Belfries Imp Statue Seal 1:** This Imp Statue Seal requires not a Stonesword Key but an Imbued Sword Key. The Imp Statue does not give way to a door, but unlocks a teleporter instead. It unlocks a teleporter that takes you to an isolated part of **Crumbling Farum Azula.**

locations.title: Imp Seal Statue
locations.description: **The Four Belfries Imp Statue Seal 3:** This teleporter will take you to a part of the Siofra River's ruins.

locations.title: Imp Seal Statue

There's a [Memory Stone](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164676) at the top of the tower.

Land on the square roof of the building to the east, then drop down on the southern edge of the roof to land on a balcony.

locations.title: Subterranean Inquisition Chamber
locations.description:
Use Site of grace Schoolhouse Classroom in the Raya Lucaria Academy to access this location. Exit the room use the waterwheel to go down. Let the Abducting Virgin eat you and die inside her. This will teleport you to Volcano Manor Secret Zone.Head north east until you find a cave. Work your way down using jump platforms and you will find the new location.

(?)

locations.title: Wandering Mausoleum
locations.description:
Inside you'll be able to access _Remembrance Duplication_ (only one use).

**Hint:** Can be purchashed from the [Isolated Merchant ](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165346)

**Solution:** Destroy the white growths on it's legs until it collapses

locations.title: D's Bell Bearing
locations.description:
**Related Merchant:** [D (Roundtable Hold)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167782)  
**Utility:** Unlocks the related merchant's inventory at the [Twin Maiden Husks](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167787).  
**Location:** There are two possible locations:
- If [D's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167218) is progressed first: On the ground, where [Fia, Deathbed Companion](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167503) was.
- If the [Fire Giant](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167375) is killed first: On the ground, where [D](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167782) was.

locations.title: Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing [1]
locations.description:
**Location:** Dropped by [Erdtree Burial Watchdog](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168513).  
**Utility:** Unlocks the following items at the [Twin Maiden Husks](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167787):
- Grave Glovewort [1] @ 1,200
- Grave Glovewort [2] @ 1,800
- Grave Glovewort [3] @ 2,400

locations.title: Cracked Pot
locations.description: On a corpse at the southern end of Jarburg

locations.title: Cracked Pot
locations.description: At the entrance of a building

locations.title: Cracked Pot
locations.description: Inside a ruined building

locations.title: Cracked Pot
locations.description: **Location:** Before the entrance to Royal Knight Loretta is a little arch door in the left wall, go below it to find the pot on the right cliff of the cemetery.

locations.title: Cracked Pot
locations.description:
**Location:** Sold by [Nomadic Merchant (North Limgrave)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164534) for 600 Runes.  
**Utility:** Used in many crafting recipes.

locations.title: Cracked Pot
locations.description:
**Location:** Sold by [Nomadic Merchant (Weeping Peninsula)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164644) for 600 Runes.  
**Utility:** Used to craft several items.

locations.title: Cracked Pot
locations.description:
**Location:** Sold by [Nomadic Merchant (Caelid)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165875) for 1,500 Runes.  
**Utility:** Used in many crafting recipes.

locations.title: Cracked Pot
locations.description: In Leyndell Capital. In the room where the Spear Leyndell Knight is, on a body lying against a metal bar window.

locations.title: Godrick's Great Rune
locations.description:
**Location:** Dropped by [Godrick the Grafted](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164052).  
**Effect:** +5 to all attributes  
**Related Tower:** [Divine Tower of Limgrave](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164074)

locations.title: Great Rune of the Unborn
locations.description:
**Location:** Dropped by [Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164430)  
**Effect:** Grants access to the Rebirth mechanic from [Rennala](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165895).  
**Related Tower:** None

locations.title: Radahn's Great Rune
locations.description:
**Location:** Dropped by [Starscourge Radahn](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165444)  
**Effect:**  Increases HP, FP & Stamina by 15%  
**Related Tower:** [Divine Tower of Caelid](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165620)

locations.title: Rykard's Great Rune
locations.description:
**Location:** Dropped by [Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167571)  
**Effect:** Restores HP upon defeating enemies.  
**Related Tower:** [Divine Tower of West Altus](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167706)

locations.title: Morgott's Great Rune
locations.description:
**Location:** Dropped by [Morgott, the Omen King](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167374)  
**Effect:** Greatly increases HP  
**Related Tower:** [Divine Tower of East Altus](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168667)

locations.title: Mohg's Great Rune
locations.description:
**Location:** Dropped by [Mohg, Lord of Blood](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168412)    
**Effect:** Grants a blessing that empowers nearby summoned spirits.  
**Related Tower:** [Divine Tower of East Altus](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168667)

locations.title: Malenia's Great Rune
locations.description:
**Location:** Dropped by [Malenia, Blade of Miquella](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167678)  
**Effect:** Attacks made immediately after receiving damage will partially recover HP. Reduces the healing power of the Flask of Crimson Tears.   
**Related Tower:** [Isolated Divine Tower](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167609)

locations.title: Mending Rune of the Fell Curse
locations.description:
**Location:** Rewarded for completing [Milos' Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169072)  
**Effect:** Unlocks an alternate ending.  
**Related Tower:** None

locations.title: Mending Rune of the Death-Prince
locations.description:
**Location:** Obtained from Fia if you gave the [Twinned Set](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168994) to D's brother during [D's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167218)  
**Effect:** Unlocks an alternate ending.  
**Related Tower:** None

locations.title: Mending Rune of Perfect Order
locations.description:
**Location:** Given by Goldmask after completing [Brother Corhyn's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178950).  
**Effect:** Unlocks an alternate ending.  
**Related Tower:** None

locations.title: Spectral Steed Whistle
locations.description:
**Location:** Given to you by Melina after discovering 3 Sites of Grace (excluding ones in dungeons).  
**Utility:** Enables Torrent.  
**NB:** Not tied to a specific Site of Grace.

locations.title: Sewing Needle
locations.description:
**Location:** Dropped by the [Demi-Human Chief (2)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164457).  
**Utility:** Part of [Boc's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165122).

locations.title: Dectus Medallion (Left)
locations.description:
**Location:** In a chest, atop the highest tower of [Fort Haight](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164002).  
**Utility:** When joined with [Dectus Medallion (Right)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166653), activates the [Grand Lift of Dectus](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164180).

locations.title: Rusty Key
locations.description:
**Location:** On the 3rd floor; in a corpse in the corner of the room.  
**Utility:** Used to open the [Locked Door](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164669).

locations.title: Flask of Wonderous Physick
locations.description:
**Location:** [Third Church of Marika](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164016).  
**Utility:** Grants the user a 3rd flask, in addition to the Flask of Crimson Tears and the Flask of Cerulean Tears. This flask has 1 charge per rest.  
**Effects:** Up to Crystal Tears may be added to the flask to produce various effects. See the different Crystal Tears.

locations.title: Chrysalid's Memento
locations.description:
**Location:** Within the large flesh mound.  
**Utility:** Part of [Roderika's Questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163950).

locations.title: Shabriri Grape
locations.description:
**Location:** Past Godrick's Throne Room, near a praying spirit.  
**Utility:** Part of [Hyetta's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169804).

locations.title: Academy Glintstone Key
locations.description:
**Location:** On a corpse, behind [Glintstone Dragon Smarag](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165267).  
**Utility:** Opens the gates to [Raya Lucaria Academy](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164427).

locations.title: Meeting Place Map
locations.description:
**Location:** On a corpse, by the [Portal to Raya Academy](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165282).  
**Utility:** Shows the location of the [Academy Glintstone Key](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165269).

locations.title: Gold Sewing Needle
locations.description:
**Location:** Inside the [Church of Vows](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165501) in a chest, alongside the [Golden Tailoring Tools](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=174473)  
**Utility:** Part of [Boc's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165122).

locations.title: Imbued Sword Key
locations.description:
**Location:** On the [rooftops](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165823); on a flat tower balcony.  
**Utility:** Activates one of the waygates at [The Four Belfries](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168786).

locations.title: Academy Glintstone Key
locations.description:
**Location:** On the chandelier in the church; access from the [rooftops](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165823).  
**Utility:** Part of [Sorcerer Thops' Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165848).

locations.title: Imbued Sword Key
locations.description:
**Location:** Chest at the summit of The Four Belfries near [The Four Belfries
Site of Grace](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164162).  
**Utility:** Activates one of the waygates at [The Four Belfries](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168786).

locations.title: Black Knifeprint
locations.description:
**Location:** Drops from [Black Knife Assassin](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164530) in [Black Knife Catacombs](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166481).  
**Utility:** Part of both [Fia's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170981) and [Rogier's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169102)

locations.title: Shabriri Grape
locations.description:
**Location:** Underground in the [Purified Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164172). The path is blocked by debris and barrels. On the left as you enter the underground.  
**Utility:** Part of [Hyetta's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169804).

locations.title: Dectus Medallion (Right)
locations.description:
**Location:** [Fort Faroth](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166072) - Enter the fort and take the ladder up immediately to your left. Will take you to a chest containing the medallion.  
**Utility:** When joined with [Dectus Medallion (Left)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164496), activates the [Grand Lift of Dectus](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164180).

locations.title: Valkyrie's Prosthesis
locations.description:
**Location:** In a chest, in the north-west of [The Shaded Castle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165485).  
**Utility:** Part of [Millicent's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177656).

locations.title: Imbued Sword Key
locations.description:
**Location:** In a chest in a sealed room. The barrier can be removed by [lighting the Braziers](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169356).  
**Utility:** Activates one of the waygates at [The Four Belfries](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168786).

locations.title: Volcano Manor Invitation
locations.description:
**Location:** Given by [Rya](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166413).  
**Utility:** Part of [Rya's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166813).

locations.title: Seedbed Curse
locations.description:
**Location:** On a corpse sitting in a chair, on the top floor of the tower.  
**Utility:** Part of [Milos' Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169072).

locations.title: Celestial Dew
locations.description:
**Location:** Inside the Academy Gate - south of the Isolated Merchant.

**NB:** Beware of ambush as you approach

locations.title: Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right)
locations.description:
**Location:** Given by [Albus](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167190).  
**Utility:** When joined with [Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167291), activates the [Grand Lift of Rold](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165469) towards the Consecrated Snowfields region.

locations.title: Rold Medallion
locations.description:
**Location:** [Elden Throne](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166538) - Rest at the site of grace to receive it from Melina.  
**Utility:** Activates the [Grand Lift of Rold](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165469) to the Mountaintops of the Giants region.

locations.title: Celestial Dew
locations.description: **Location:** On the upper floor in [Erdtree Sanctuary](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166536) on the corpse by the ladder.

locations.title: The Stormhawk King
locations.description:
**Location:** Up the stairs, to the right of the entrance to the dead maiden church.  
**Utility:** Part of the [Nepheli's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169124) & [Kenneth Haight's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164854)

locations.title: Seedbed Curse
locations.description:
**Location:** On a corpse sitting in a chair, in the library on the manor's 1st floor.  
**Utility:** Part of [Milos' Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169072)

locations.title: Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left)
locations.description:
**Location:** [Castle Sol](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164417) - on the roof of the tower.  
**Utility:** When joined with [Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167191), activates the [Grand Lift of Rold](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165469) towards the Consecrated Snowfields region.

locations.title: Amber Starlight Shard
locations.description:
**Location:** Under a statue, at the end of the [Altus Cave](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=180897).  
**Utility:** Part of [Seluvis' Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169060).

locations.title: Unalloyed Gold Needle
locations.description:
**Location:** Dropped from [Commander O'Neil](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166073)  
**Utility:** Part of [Gowry's Request](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166842). Bring to the Scarlet Aeonia in [Malenia, Blade of Miquella](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167678) room to obtain [Miquella's Needle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=176810) and a [Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=176809)

locations.title: Celestial Dew
locations.description: On a ledge that can only be dropped to from the side path through the Ant Queen chamber

locations.title: Shabriri Grape
locations.description:
**Location:** Dropped by [Edgar The Revenger](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166811)  
**Utility:** Part of [Hyetta's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169804)

locations.title: Fingerprint Grape
locations.description:
**Location:** Dropped by [Festering Fingerprint Vyke](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167188).  
**Utility:** Part of [Hyetta's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169804).

locations.title: Celestial Dew
locations.description: On a corpse just on the road

locations.title: Celestial Dew
locations.description: After Rune Arc, jump across to the building west, follow the ledge in the opposite direction to reach behind this building.

locations.title: Celestial Dew
locations.description: Behind a pillar on a corpse

locations.title: Serpent's Amnion
locations.description:
**Location:** On the altar, after defeating [Godskin Noble](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168177)  
**Utility:** Part of [Rya's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166813).

locations.title: Celestial Dew
locations.description: **Location:** On the body against the wall - protected by 3 snails.

locations.title: Miniature Ranni
locations.description:
**Location:** In a coffin, on the side of river.  Speak to it a few times until it responds.  
**Utility:** Part of [Ranni's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166648).

**Note:** You can access this area via the [Portal to Ainsel River Main](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170219)

locations.title: Sewer Gaol Key
locations.description:
**Location:** Given to you by [Milos (Dung Eater)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168231) once you have at least one Seedbed Curse.  
**Utility:** Unlocks the [Sewer Entrance](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168119).

locations.title: Cursemark of Death
locations.description:
**Location:** On a corpse, at the top of the tower.  
**Utility:** Part of [Ranni's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166648).

locations.title: Fingerslayer Blade
locations.description:
**Location:** In a chest, under a statue.  
**Utility:** Part of [Ranni's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166648).

locations.title: Telescope
locations.description:
**Location:** Sold by [Merchant Kalé](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164446) for 500 Runes.  
**Utility:** Allows long-range sight.

locations.title: Sellian Sealbreaker
locations.description:
**Location:** Given by [Sorceress Sellen](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164616) as part of her [quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164621).  
**Utility:** Unlocks the sealed gate within [Sellia Hideaway](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167197).

locations.title: Sellen's Primal Glintstone
locations.description:
**Location:** Given by [Sorceress Sellen (Prisoner)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165418).  
**Utility:** Part of [Sorceress Sellen's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164621).

locations.title: Celestial Dew
locations.description: **Location:** On a corpse in the structure accessible by dropping down from the Nokron Bridge.

locations.title: Lantern
locations.description:
**Location:** Sold by [Nomadic Merchant (West Liurna)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165624) for 1,800 Runes.  
**Utility:** Emits light without needing a torch, freeing both hands.

locations.title: Alexander's Innards
locations.description:
**Location:** Drops from [Alexander Iron Fist (Crumbling Farum Azula)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169811)  
**Utility:** Part of [Jar-Bairn's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177964).

locations.title: Weathered Dagger
locations.description:
**Location:** Given by [Fia, Deathbed Companion](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167503).  
**Utility:** Part of [D's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167218).

locations.title: Seedbed Curse
locations.description:
**Location:** On a corpse sitting in a chair on the ledge of the same level as the [Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170274).  
**Utility:** Part of [Milos' Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169072).

locations.title: Taunter's Tongue
locations.description:
**Location:** Dropped by [Mad Tongue Alberich](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168844).  
**Utility:** Lures invaders.

locations.title: Beast Eye
locations.description:
**Location:** Given by [Gurranq](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165617) upon bringing him 1st deathroot.  
**Utility:** Notifies the player when close to Deathroot.

locations.title: Seedbed Curse
locations.description:
**Location:** On a corpse in the lower part of the wall. From the Prayer Room site of grace, go north and descend the three flights of stairs. Just before the room with cleanrot knights, jump down and to the right where a passage leads down to the corpse.  
**Utility:** Part of [Milos' Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169072).

locations.title: Dancer's Castanets
locations.description:
**Location:** Given by [Patches](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=175930)  
**Utility:** Can by given to [Tanith](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167573), yet doesn't have a utility as of right now.

locations.title: Seedbed Curse
locations.description:
**Location:** On a corpse guarded by several Albinaurics, behind the Imp Seal Statue at the top of the manor.  
**Utility:** Part of [Milos' Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169072).

locations.title: Celestial Dew
locations.description:
**Location:** Sold by [Hermit Merchant (Ainsel River)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167622) for 7,500 Runes.  
**Utility:** If used at the [Church of Vows](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165501), resets negative relationships.

locations.title: Discarded Palace Key
locations.description:
**Location:** Given by [Miniature Ranni](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169052) after defeating the [Baleful Shadow](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168546).  
**Utility:** Opens the locked chest near [Rennala](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165895), containing the [Dark Moon Ring](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177447).

locations.title: Miquella's Needle
locations.description:
**Location:** After defeating [Malenia, Blade of Miquella](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167678), bring the [Unalloyed Gold Needle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167903) to the Scarlet Aeonia within the room. It will give a [Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=176809) and this.  
**Utility:** Use in [Dragonlord Placidusax](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168522)'s arena to remove the Flame of Frenzy from the player.  
**Note (spoilers):** [The Flame of Frenzy](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164845) locks the player in the Lord of Frenzied Flame ending. Once the player has it, Miquella's Needle is the only way to obtain the other endings.

locations.title: Amber Draught
locations.description:
**Location:** Given by [Preceptor Seluvis](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165877) after progressing through [Seluvis' Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169060).  
**Utility:** Quest item

locations.title: Dark Moon Ring
locations.description:
**Location:** In a locked chest, near [Rennala](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165895). Requires the [Discarded Palace Key](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=176421) to unlock.

locations.title: Memory Stone
locations.description:
**Location:** Located at the top of [Lenne's Rise](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165911).  
To access Lenne's Rise, you'll need to enter through a window using the nearby [Sprirtspring Jump](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167024).  
Land on the square roof of the building to the east, then drop down on the southern edge of the roof to land on a balcony.  
**Utility:** Increases the number of available spell slots.

- [Great Glintstone Shard](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=182160)
- [Swift Glintstone Shard](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=182161)

Near the [Comet](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166818) Sorcery

locations.description: In the rooftop of the church

From the the top of ladder down to [Merchant Pidia](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167407), drop off to the south onto the rampart below and continue onward. Will be guarded by a Giant Crab.

locations.description: On a corpse hanging over the cliff, on lowest floor.

locations.description: **Location:** In [Sealed Tunnel](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165471) - above the iron maiden.

locations.title: Stonesword key
locations.description: Guarded by a large and several small madness inducing magical flowers

locations.title: Stonesword Key
locations.description: Found on a body hanging on the ledge of a rock, access from above next to where the Perfume Bottle item is

locations.title: Stonesword Key
locations.description: This key is located in the sewers. When traveling through the tunnels filled with slugs, one of the holes you can drop down into will lead to an area with three casting enemies as well as a corpse with this item on it. Earlier in the tunnels you will see this corpse through a metal gate you cannot open.

locations.title: Stonesword Key
locations.description: On a corpse

locations.title: Stonesword Key
locations.description: On a body laying on a roof of a gazebo.

locations.title: Stonesword Key
locations.description:
**Location:** On the roof. 

Jump over the ledge next to the three Oracle Envoys at the end of the East Capital Rampart. Head north and jump along the rooftops until you find a corpse hanging off the edge of the building next to two stone Imps.

locations.title: Stonesword Key
locations.description: Inside the small tower housing a handful of rats.

locations.title: Stonesword Key
locations.description: **Location:** Sold by [Nomadic Merchant (Caelid)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165875) for 4,000 Runes.

locations.description: **Location:** On a corpse hanging from the wall on the top of the tower.

locations.description: South East exit of Rya's room (her location after Godskin Noble fight), there is an open window you can jump through to reach the key (?)

locations.description: Corpse on chair, near cliff.

locations.description: **Location:** In [Gelmir Hero's Grave](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168144) - past the fire trap to the right.

locations.title: 3x Stonesword Key
locations.description: **Location:** Sold by [Isolated Merchant (Raya Academy)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165649) for 3,000 Runes each.

locations.description: **Location:** Sold by the [Imprisoned Merchant](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168583) for 5,000 Runes each.

locations.description: Sold by [Twin Maiden Husks](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167787) for 4,000 runes each.

locations.description: **Location:** Sold by [Hermit Merchant (Mountaintops East)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167330) for 5,000 Runes each.

locations.title: Talisman Pouch
locations.description:
**Location:** Dropped by [Margit, the Fell Omen](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163938)  
**Utility:** Increases the number of talismans you can carry.

locations.title: Talisman Pouch
locations.description:
**Location:** Dropped by [Godfrey, First Elden Lord](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167693)  
**Utility:** Increases the number of talismans you can carry.

locations.title: Talisman Pouch
locations.description:
**Location:** Given by [Finger Reader Enia](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170553) after bringing her two Great Runes.  
**Utility:** Increases the number of talismans you can carry.

**Note:**  If the pouch is not collected from Enia before killing [Godfrey](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167693), it can be purchased at the Twin Maiden Husks @ 500

locations.title: Tailoring Tools
locations.description:
**Location:** Dropped by the [Demi-Human Chief (2)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164457).  
**Utility:** Enables armor alterations at Sites of Grace for 500 Runes. If given to Boc as part of [his quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165122), he will alter armor for free.

locations.title: Mimic's Veil
locations.description:
**Location:** On the 3rd floor; in a chest, on a small wooden dais.  
**Utility:** Use to mimic a nearby object; useful in multiplayer, as other players don't detect you.

locations.title: Prattling Pate "Thank You"
locations.description:
**Location:** [Tombsward Catacombs](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163989) - in the room at the end of the fire trap. On a corpse.  
**Utility:** Use to produce the corresponding voiceline.

locations.title: Prattling Pate "Please Help"
locations.description:
**Location:** [Impaler's Catacombs](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163961) - after triggering the spike trap and dropping down into the water below. Found on a corpse near the ghouls.  
**Utility:** Use to produce the corresponding voiceline.

locations.title: Wraith Calling Bell
locations.description:
**Location:** [Laskyar Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164148) - Underground. Access via the stairs in the north-west corner of the ruins.  
**Utility:** Use to summon a prowling, homing wraith to attack an enemy.

locations.title: Prattling Pate "Wonderful"
locations.description:
**Location:** Found in [Cliffbottom Catacombs](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166469) - in the tunnel area on a body in the surrounding room that the player falls down in to advance.  
**Utility:** Use to produce the corresponding voiceline.

locations.title: Prattling Pate "You're Beautiful"
locations.description:
**Location:** Located on the corpse on the porch.  
**Utility:** Use to produce the corresponding voiceline. 
**Note:** Part of [Boc's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165122); use it to unlock the alternative ending.

locations.title: Prattling Pate "Apologies"
locations.description:
**Location:** [Unsightly Catacombs](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164404) - Adjacent from the lever to open the boss door.  
**Utility:** Use to produce the corresponding voiceline.

locations.title: Spirit Calling Bell
locations.description:
**Location:** Given by [Renna](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167799) after obtaining the [Spectral Steed Whistle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163988).  
**Utility:** Enables Spirit Ashes Summoning.

locations.title: Prattling Pate "Hello"
locations.description:
**Location:** Behind the first fire-breathing pillar in Stormfoot Catacombs. Hit it (for example with magic or by shooting a bow) to deactivate it.  
**Utility:** Use to produce the corresponding voiceline.

locations.title: Ancestral Infant's Head
locations.description:
**Location:** In a chest guarded by an Ancestral Follower in the submerged ruin.  
**Utility:** Use to spawn a damaging geyser of spirit vapor.

locations.title: Prattling Pate "My beloved"
locations.description:
**Location:** On some mushrooms at the end of the lowest branch.  
**Utility:** Use to produce the corresponding voiceline.

locations.title: Crafting Kit
locations.description:
**Location:** Sold by [Merchant Kalé](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164446) for 300 Runes.  
**Utility:** Enables crafting.

locations.title: Mohg's Shackle
locations.description:
**Location:** On a corpse in Subterranean Shunning Grounds, On the ground of the large room full of pipes. Guarded by a Lobster.  
**Utility:** On use, briefly stuns the following bosses. Usable twice per boss fight, and only during the 1st phase:
- [Mohg, the Omen](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168657)
- [Mohg, Lord of Blood](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168412)

locations.title: Golden Tailoring Tools
locations.description:
**Location:** Found in a chest in the [Church of Vows](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165501), alongside the [Gold Sewing Needle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165648)  
**Utility:** Enables demigod garb alteration at Sites of Grace for 500 Runes. If given to Boc as part of [his quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165122), he will alter demigod armor for free.

locations.title: Prattling Pate "Let's Get to It"
locations.description:
**Location:** In a room guarded by a Duelist, accessible by following the path from the ladder right of the boss door.  
**Utility:** Use to produce the corresponding voiceline.

locations.title: Omen Bairn
locations.description:
**Location:** Reward for defeating an Omen Ogre in Subterranean Shunning Grounds, in a large room after passing the sewer pipes full of Basilisks.  
**Utility:** Use to summon homing wraiths at enemies.

locations.title: Blasphemous Claw
locations.description:
**Location:** Dropped by [Recusant Bernahl](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168392).  
**Utility:** Use to deflect certain attacks from [Maliketh, the Black Blade](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167619), briefly stunning him on a success.

locations.title: Bloody Finger
locations.description:
**Location:** Given by [Varré](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164440) as part of [Varré's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=174930).  
**Utility:** Use to invade another player's world. Essentially an infinitely reusable Festering Bloody Finger.

locations.title: Pureblood Knight's Medal
locations.description:
**Location:** Given by [Varré](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164440) as part of [Varré's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=174930).  
**Utility:** Use to teleport to [Dynasty Mausoleum Entrance](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167515) Site of Grace. Functions in combat.

locations.title: Regal Omen Bairn
locations.description:
**Location:** Trade the [Remembrance of the Omen King](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167203) to [Finger Reader Enia](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170553)  
**Utility:** Fire homing, spectral projectiles at nearby enemies.

locations.title: Margit's Shackle
locations.description:
**Location:** Sold by [Patches](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165135) for 5,000 Runes.  
**Utility:** On use, briefly stuns the following bosses. Usable twice per boss fight, and only during the 1st phase:
- [Margit, the Fell Omen](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163938)
- [Margit, The Fell Omen (Leyndell)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168001)
- [Morgott, the Omen King](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167374)

locations.title: Lantern
locations.description:
**Location:** Sold by [Isolated Merchant (Weeping Peninsula)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165346) for 1,800 Runes.  
**Utility:** Illuminates the area around the player without requiring a hand

locations.title: Whetstone Knife
locations.description:
**Location:** Inside the [Gatefront Ruins Hidden Cellar](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164084).  
**Utility:** Used to add or replace Skills and Affinities on weapons and shields.

locations.title: Iron Whetblade
locations.description:
**Location:** In the cellar guarded by the [Imp Seal Statue](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164744).  
**Utility:** Used to add the following Affinities to *any* Ash of War:
- Heavy: Increases STR scaling, decreases all other scalings.
- Keen: Increases DEX scaling, decreases all other scalings.
- Quality: Balances STR and DEX scalings, decreses base damage.

locations.title: Glintstone Whetblade
locations.description:
**Location:** In a small room, up in on the balcony.  
**Utility:** Used to add the following Affinities to physical and magic Ashes of War:
- Magic: Increases INT scaling, decreases all other scalings. Adds magic damage, reduces base damage. While guarding, increases Magic defense, decreses all other defenses.
- Cold: Increases INT scaling, decreases all other scalings. Adds magic damage, reduces base damage. Grants Frostbite buildup while attacking.

locations.title: Red-Hot Whetblade
locations.description:
**Location:** Inside the tower, guarded by an Iron Maiden.  
**Utility:** Used to add the following Affinities to physical and flame Ashes of War:
- Fire: Decreases all scalings. Adds fire damage, reduces base damage. While guarding, increases Fire defense, decreases all other defenses. Changes fire damage scaling to STR instead of FAI.
- Flame Art: Increases FAI scaling, decreases all other scalings. Adds fire damage, reduces base damage.

locations.title: Sanctified Whetblade
locations.description:
**Location:** Inside the manor, in the first floor's south wing. On a corpse past a broken wall.  
**Utility:** Used to add the following Affinities to physical and golden Ashes of War:
- Sacred: Increases FAI scaling, decreases all other scalings. Adds Holy damage, reduces base damage. While guarding, increases Holy defense, decreses all other defenses.
- Lightning: Increases DEX scaling, decreases all other scalings. Adds Lightning damage, reduces base damage. While guarding, increases Lightning defense, decreses all other defenses.

locations.title: Black Whetblade
locations.description:
**Location:** In front of the altar, on a corpse.  
**Utility:** Used to add the following Affinities to physical and occult Ashes of War:
- Poison: Increases STR, DEX and ARC scaling. Grants Poison buildup while attacking.
- Blood: Increases ARC scaling, decreases all other scalings. Grants Bleed buildup while attacking, or empowers an existing Bleed effect, scaling with ARC.
- Occult: Increases ARC scaling, decreases all other scalings.

locations.title: Triumphant Delight
locations.description: **Location:** Given by [Alexander Iron Fist](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164117) as part of [Alexander Iron Fist's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170547).

locations.title: Sitting Sideways
locations.description: **Location:** Given by the [Red Cloaked Woman](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163944).

locations.title: Strength!
locations.description: **Location:** [Stranded Graveyard](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163931) - after defeating the [Soldier of Godrick](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164420), before you drop off the cliff edge

locations.title: Nod In Thought
locations.description: **Location:** Given by [Sorceress Sellen](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164616) upon starting [Sorceress Sellen's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164621).

locations.title: Dozing Crossed-Legged
locations.description: **Location:** On the [rooftops](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165157); access by jumping across from the top floor.

locations.title: Grovel For Mercy
locations.description: **Location:** Dropped by [Patches](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164504), or given by him if spared.

locations.title: Crossed Legs
locations.description: **Location:** Found on a sitting corpse, at the top of a tall chunk of ruin. Use Torrent and climb up the rubble side.

locations.title: Bravo!
locations.description: **Location:** Read the message under [Varré](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164440)'s original location, after advancing [Varré's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=174930). The gesture is only available after you beat at least the first demi-god.

locations.title: Spread Out
locations.description: **Location:** Given by [Blackguard](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166187) after buying prawns from him for the first time.

locations.title: Fancy Spin
locations.description: **Location:** Given after summoning [Spirit Jellyfish Ashes](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165103) within [Stargazer Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166217).

locations.title: Finger Snap
locations.description:
**Location:** Learned from [Merchant Kalé](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164446).  
**Unlock condition:**
- Speak with him after hearing the wolf's howl in [Mistwood Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164003).

locations.title: What Do You Want?
locations.description:
**Location:** Given by [Ensha](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=182164) after interacting with him.  
**Note:** Make sure to obtain this before receiving [Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167191) or [Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167291)

locations.title: By My Sword
locations.description: **Location:** Inside the manor, in the small room in the south wing first floor.

locations.title: Fire Spur Me
locations.description: **Location:** Beside the brazier, in the middle of the camp.

locations.title: Polite Bow
locations.description: **Location:** Given by [Finger Maiden Thorelina](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168094) before fighting [Starscourge Radahn](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165444).

locations.title: Heartening Cry
locations.description: **Location:** Given by [Jerren](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168920).

locations.title: My Thanks
locations.description: **Location:** In the hallway, after defeating [Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167571).

locations.title: Inner Order
locations.description: **Location:** Given by [D’s Brother](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168405) after giving him the [Twinned Set](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170979) as part of [D's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167218).

locations.title: Calm Down!
locations.description:
**Location:** [Murkwater Cave](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164022) - spare [Patches'](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164504) life, then use [Patches' Trap Chest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165137). Return to speak with him to receive the gesture.  
**Note:** Unobtainable after meeting [Patches at the Scenic Isle Site of Grace](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166734)

locations.title: My Lord
locations.description: **Location:** Given by Boc after giving him the [Golden Sewing Needle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165648), as part of [Boc's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165122).

locations.title: As You Wish
locations.description: **Location:** Given by [Hyetta (First Location)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166502) as part of [Hyetta's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169804).

locations.title: Casual Greeting
locations.description: **Location:** Summon [Great Horned Tragoth](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167550) before fighting [Magma Wyrm Makar](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166245).

locations.title: Reverential Bow
locations.description: **Location:** Given by [Mad Tongue Alberich](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168844); let him complete his gesture to receive.

locations.title: Outer Order
locations.description: **Location:** Given by Melina after speaking to her at the [Minor Erdtree Church](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165473) Site of Grace.

locations.title: Curtsy
locations.description: **Location:** Given by [Roderika](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170232), after upgrading a single Spirit Ashes to +4 or higher.

locations.title: Hoslow's Oath
locations.description: **Location:** Received upon invading [Juno Hoslow, Knight of Blood](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168540).

locations.title: The Ring
locations.description: Gained on startup if pre-ordered. Can also be obtained by completing a boss as a summon with someone who pre-ordered the game.

locations.title: Erudition
locations.description: **Location:** Given by [Sorcerer Thops](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165263) after completing [Sorcerer Thops' quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165848).

locations.title: Desperate Prayer
locations.description: **Location:** Given by [Gowry](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166841) as part of [Gowry's Request](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166842).

locations.title: Rapture
locations.description: **Location:** Acquired by greeting the Two Fingers beside [Finger Reader Enia](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170553)

locations.title: Balled Up
locations.description: **Location:** Given by [Rennala](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165895) after rebirthing for the first time.

locations.title: Extreme Repentance
locations.description:
**Location:** Given by [Patches](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164504) under the following conditions:
1. Befriend him by sparring his life. Doing so will reward you with [Grovel For Mercy](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165136).
2. Reinitiate the fight by attacking him 3 times.
3. Let yourself get hit. When your HP is low enough, Patches will offer you to surrender.
4. Perform the Grovel for Mercy gesture you obtained earlier. Doing so will grant you Extreme Repentance. Use it to end the fight.

locations.title: Golden Order Totality
locations.description: **Location:** Given by [Goldmask](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168528) as part of [Brother Corhyn's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178950).

locations.title: Patches' Crouch

Hitting him once will cause him to surrender and give you this emote.

locations.title: Maiden's Blood (Varre's Questline)
locations.description:
**Related Quest:** [Varré's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=174930)

After defeating the Grafted Scion, continue back to the room you started the game in. Laying against the wall is the remains of a maiden. Interact with her body to soak the cloth with her blood to give to Varre.

**Location:** [Castle Morne](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163951) - at the top of the north-eastern tower.  
**Related Quest:**  Deliver the letter to him during [Irina's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164638)  
**Loot:** Banished Knight's Halberd +8

**Note:** Once [Leonine Misbegotten ](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164812)is defeated, you may speak with Edgar again

**Location:** Found on top of the giant arch

**Note:** If killed, drops a [golden seed](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169288).

locations.title: Nepheli Loux
locations.description:
**Location:** Inside a side building, by a dead guard.

Speak to her and exhaust her dialogue to have her available as a summon against [Godrick the Grafted](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164421)

locations.title: Bloody Finger Hunter Yura (Murkwater Cave)
locations.description:
**Location:** Underneath the stone arch, just north of [Murkwater Cave](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164022).  
**Quest:** Part of [Yura's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170973); he spawns here after completing step 3.

locations.title: Alexander Iron Fist (Gael Tunnel)
locations.description:
**Location:** Close to the [Rear Gael Tunnel Entrance](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164857) Site of Grace
**Quest:** [Alexander Iron Fist's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170547); he moves here after step 2.

locations.title: Boc (Coastal Cave) (2nd location)
locations.description:
**Location:** Laying on the ground, wounded, by the [Coastal Cave](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164030) Site of Grace.  
**Quest:** Part of [Boc's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165122); give him the [Sewing Needle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164459) to advance the quest.

locations.title: Blaidd the Half-Wolf
locations.description:
**Location:** Within the [Mistwood Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164003).  
**Quest:** Part of [Blaidd's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165205); after obtaining the [Finger Snap](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167512) gesture, return here and use it when you hear the howl. Blaidd will spawn here.

locations.title: Sorceress Sellen (Prisoner)
locations.description:
**Location:** [Witchbane Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163983) - in the underground cellar.  
**Quest:** Part of [Sorceress Sellen's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164621):
- Speak with her to receive

locations.description:
**Location:** On the northern battlement of [Fort Haight](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164002).  
**Quest:** Part of [Kenneth Haight's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164854); he relocates here after step 3.

locations.title: Boc (Lake-Facing Cliffs)
locations.description:
**Location:** Sitting by the [Lake-Facing Cliffs](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164145) Site of Grace.  
**Quest:** Part of [Boc's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165122). Can be interacted with for free armor alterations.  
**Note:** Boc relocates according to your progress; see the quest for further information.

locations.title: D (Summonwater Village)
locations.description:
**Location:** At the entrance of [Summonwater Village](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164017).  
**Quest:** Part of [D's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167218); he relocates here after step 1. Speaking with him adds a waypoint to a [Sending Gate](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165596), that leads to [Gurranq, Beast Clergyman](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165617).

locations.title: Sorcerer Thops (Raya Lucaria Academy)
locations.description:
**Note:** Can be found dead after completing [Sorcerer Thops' Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165848).  
**Loot:** 
- [Thops's Bell Bearing](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165854)
- [Academy Glintstone Staff](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165855)
- [Thops's Barrier](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165856)

locations.title: Finger Reader
locations.description: Tells the player about two crescent halves they have to bring together to the Great Lift of Raya Lucaria

locations.title: Finger Reader Crone
locations.description:
Informs you of the Radahn Festival at Redmane Castle and of Millicent.

"...Are you one for festivals? Or flowers?
To the South, a grand festival to make the stars turn.  
To the East, the hardened bud of a flower to be.  
But dare you enter?
Into the heart of the scarlet rot?"

locations.title: Finger Reader
