locations.description:
Give her Shabriri Grapes again

**Quest:** [Hyetta's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169804)

locations.title: Hyetta (3rd Location)
locations.description: **Quest:** [Hyetta's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169804)

locations.title: Giant King Jar
locations.description: just interact with the NPC, and three marks of invasion will appear that you must defeat to continue the quest (?)

locations.title: Patches (2nd Location)
locations.description:
If you spared [Patches](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164504) after fighting him he will appear here.

**Quest:** [Patches' Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166248)

locations.title: Latenna the Albinauric
locations.description: **Location:** Found at the end of [Lakeside Crystal Cave](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166448)

locations.title: Boc (East Raya Lucaria Gate)
locations.description:
**Location:** Sitting by the [East Raya Lucaria Gate](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164179) Site of Grace.  
**Quest:** Part of [Boc's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165122). Can be interacted with for free armor alterations.  
**Note:** Boc relocates according to your progress; see the quest for further information.

locations.title: Albus
locations.description:
**Location:** Hidden as a pot in a dark corner. Attack the pot to reveal him.

**Items:**
- Gives the key item [Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167191)

locations.title: Hyetta (4th Location)
locations.description: Give her the [Fingerprint Grape](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166632) from the NPC invader at [Church of Inhibition](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165517).

locations.title: Diallos (2nd Location)
locations.description: After speaking to him in Roundtable Hold, Diallos can be found here, mourning over the body of Lanya. Exhaust his dialogue and the speak to him again in Roundtable Hold to progress [his quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167784).

locations.title: Millicent (1st Location)
locations.description: **Quest:** [Millicent's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177656)

locations.title: Fia, Deathbed Companion
locations.description: **Quest:** [Fia's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170981) (Fia also plays a role in [D's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167218)).

locations.title: Millicent (3rd Location)
locations.description:
Up the hill from the Erdtree-Gazing Hill.

Will remain here until you give her the Valkyrie's Prosthesis from the shaded Castle

**Quest:** [Millicent's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177656)

locations.title: Tanith
locations.description:
She moves after defeating [Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167571) to [here](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169064).
Attacking her will summon a bodyguard. Defeating the bodyguard allows you to loot her corpse for the Consort's Set.

Gives you Drawing Room Key

locations.title: Brother Corhyn (2nd Location)
locations.description:
Moves here after leaving Roundtable Hold.

**Quest:** [Brother Corhyn's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178950)

locations.title: Millicent (2nd Location)
locations.description: **Quest:** [Millicent's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177656)

locations.title: Blaidd (Ranni's Quest - 1st Location)
locations.description: Part of [Ranni's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166648).

locations.title: Diallos
locations.description: **Quest:**  [Diallos' Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167784)

locations.title: Renna
locations.description:
**Location:** [Church of Elleh](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163935) - appears after receiving Torrent.

**Begins Quest:** [Ranni's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166648)

Gives you the Spirit Calling Bell and the [Lone Wolf Ashes](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165685)

locations.title: Alexander Iron Fist (Mt. Gelmir)
locations.description:
**Location:** In the lava lake, behind the [Magma Wyrm](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167377).  
**Quest:** Part of [Alexander Iron Fist's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170547); moves here after step 6. Can be spoken to from the rock in the middle of the lake.

locations.title: Boc (Altus Highway Junction)
locations.description:
**Location:** Sitting by the [Altus Highway Junction](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167000) Site of Grace.  
**Quest:** Part of [Boc's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165122). Can be interacted with for free armor alterations.  
**Note:** Boc relocates according to your progress; see the quest for further information.

locations.title: Yura (Second Church of Marika)
locations.description:
**Location:** Inside [Second Church of Marika](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165478).  
**Quest:** Part of [Yura's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170973); relocates here after step 6. Speak with him to trigger [Eleonora, Violet Bloody Finger](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168051)'s invasion.

locations.title: Palm Reader
locations.description: Before waygate

locations.title: Millicent (4th Location)
locations.description:
Found here a bit down the hill from the Site of Grace. Will appear after you kill the Godskin Apostle.

**Quest:** [Millicent's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177656)

locations.title: Blaidd (Ranni’s Quest - Second location)
locations.description: Waiting for the festival’s start

locations.title: Finger Maiden Thorelina
locations.description: Waiting for the festival’s start

locations.title: Alexander Iron Fist (Redmane Castle)
locations.description:
**Location:** Standing in a corner of the [Redmane Castle Plaza](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164418). 
**Quest:** [Alexander Iron Fist's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170547); he moves here after step 3.

locations.title: Blaidd (Ranni’s Quest - third location)
locations.description: After defeating Radahn

locations.title: Dung Eater
locations.description:
Locked in a cell at the end of the sewers.  You'll need the [Sewer Gaol Key](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169062) to access.

Drops Sword of Milos and [Omen Set](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=171319) if killed.  But if you want to progress [Dung Eater's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169072) you shouldn't kill him.

locations.title: Blackguard (2nd Location)
locations.description:
Appears if you bought Rya's Necklace and a Boiled Prawn at his [first location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166187)

**Quest:** [Blackguard's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177672)  
**Note:** After completion of his quest, drops the following:
- [Blackguard's Bell Bearing](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=175956)
- [Blackguard's Iron Mask](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=175958)
- [Iron Ball](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=175957) (with [Ash of War: Braggart's Roar](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170491) attached to it)

locations.title: Sorcerer Rogier (2nd Location)
locations.description:
Shows up here after meeting him in Stormhill Castle once you defeat [Godrick the Grafted](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164421) and exhaust his dialogue

**Quest:** [Rogier's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169102)

locations.title: D's Brother
locations.description:
**Location:** Sitting on a balcony, south of the [Great Waterfall Basin](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167612) Site of Grace.  
**Quest:** Part of [D's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167218); give him the [Twinned Set](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170979) to recieve the [Inner Order](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168624) gesture and advance the quest.

locations.title: Brother Corhyn & Goldmask  (Fourth Location)
locations.description: **Quest:** [Brother Corhyn's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178950)

locations.title: Goldmask
locations.description:
**Location:** At the end of the bridge - above the [Road of Iniquity Side Path](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166783) Site of Grace. Use the Spiritspring to access.  
**Quest:**  ??

locations.title: Brother Corhyn (3rd Location)
locations.description:
**Location:** Will appear after you tell him where you saw Goldmask.

**Quest:** [Brother Corhyn's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178950)

locations.title: Alexander Iron Fist (Liurnia)
locations.description:
**Location:** Stuck in the ground, just east of the path to [Artist's Shack](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169464), due south of [Carian Study Hall](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164173).  
**Quest:** [Alexander Iron Fist's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170547); he moves here after step 6.  
You'll need to throw an Oil Pot or a Roped Oil Pot at him, then hit him a few times in order to dislodge him.

locations.title: Boc (East Capital Rampart)
locations.description:
**Location:** Sitting by the [East Capital Rampart](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167193) Site of Grace.  
**Quest:** Part of [Boc's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165122). Can be interacted with for free armor alterations.  
**Note:** Boc stays here until his quest is advanced.

locations.title: Jerren
locations.description:
**Location:** North of the [Redmane Castle Plaza](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164418), sitting in a chair.  
**Quest:** Part of [Sorceress Sellen's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164621):
- Speak with him after defeating [Starscourge Radahn](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165444); he will relocate [here](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169155) after step 8 of the quest.

locations.title: Master Lusat
locations.description:
**Location:** [Sellia Hideaway](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167197); behind a locked door at the far bottom of the cave. Requires the [Sellian Sealbreaker](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170409) to open.  
**Quest:** Part of [Sorceress Sellen's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164621):
- Interact with him to recieve [Stars of Ruin](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169050), then go back to [Sorceress Sellen](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164616).

locations.title: Brother Corhyn & Goldmask (Fifth Location)
locations.description: On a bridge leading to the Erdtree.

locations.title: Millicent (5th Location)
locations.description:
**Location:** Near the site of grace - will appear after you meet her [here](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168077)

**Quest:** [Millicent's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177656)

locations.title: Patches (3rd Location)
locations.description:
**Location:** In the bushes near the rainbow stones. 

Not available as a merchant here - but will throw you off the cliff if you get close to the edge.

**Quest:** [Patches' Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166248)

locations.title: Fia (3rd Location)
locations.description: **Quest:** [Fia's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170981)

locations.title: Gideon Ofnir
locations.description:
**Interactions:**
- After reaching Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum, telling Gideon rewards you with Fevor's Cookbook [3]
- After reaching Miquella's Haligtree, he rewards you with Black Flame's Protection.
- After killing Mohg, Lord of Blood, talking to him rewards you with Law of Causality.
- After killing Malenia, Blade of Miquella,  he rewards you with Lord's Divine Fortification.

locations.title: Tanith (2nd Location)
locations.description: After defeating the boss and exhausting her dialogue in the Manor she will be here, attacking her will make her bodyguard invade you and drop the incantation Aspects of the Crucible: Breath

locations.title: Diallos (3rd Location)
locations.description: **Quest:**  [Diallos' Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167784)

locations.title: Iron Fist Alexander (Starscourge Radahn)
locations.description: **Location:** Beside the [Starscourge Radahn](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166635) Site of Grace; appears after the boss fight.

locations.title: Festival Master
locations.description: Speak to him to gain access to the Radahn fight

locations.title: Gatekeeper Gostoc (2nd Location)
locations.description: **Location:** By the [Godrick the Grafted](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164052) Site of Grace, once you defeated the boss.

locations.title: Jerren (Witchbane Ruins)
locations.description:
**Location:** Beside [Sellen's now dead body](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165418), underneath [Witchbane Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163983).
**Quest:** Part of [Sorceress Sellen's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164621):
- If he's not there, you need to speak with him [here](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168920) first.
- Speak with him to advance the quest.

locations.title: Rya (2nd Location)
locations.description:
She will be there if you gave her the necklace from Blackguard at Liurnia of the lakes. Teleports you to Volcano Manor.

**Quest:** [Rya's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166813)

locations.title: Rya (4th Location)
locations.description:
Moves here after completing your first letter for the Volcano Manor. She is in the room across from the Drawing Room.

**Quest:** [Rya's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166813)

locations.title: The Towering Sister
locations.description:
Summon Latenna in front of her to complete her quest (assuming you collected her Spirit Ashes). 

Will reward you with a Somber Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone

locations.title: Yura (Zamor Ruins)
locations.description:
**Location:** Next to [Zamor Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166547) Site of Grace.  
**Quest:** Part of [Yura's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170973); relocates here after completion of his quest.

locations.title: Roderika (2nd Location)
locations.description: In Roundtable Hold after completing [her quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163950).

locations.title: Millicent (6th Location)
locations.description:
**Location:** Near the [Prayer Room](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167415) site of grace

**Quest:** [Millicent's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177656)

locations.title: Jar-Bairn
locations.description:
**Location:** Sitting on the steps in front of the stone house  
**Quest:** [Jar-Bairn's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177964)

locations.title: Primeval Sorcerer Azur
locations.description:
**Location:** North-East of [Hermit Village](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165884), by the cliffs.  
**Quest:** Part of [Sorceress Sellen's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164621):
- Interact with him to recieve [Comet Azur](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167814), then go back to [Sorceress Sellen](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164616).

locations.title: Sellen's Body
locations.description:
**Location:** [Seluvis's Hidden Cellar](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168240); behind an illusory wall, just left of the note saying 'Seluvis' puppet. Do not touch.'.  
**Quest:** Part of [Sorceress Sellen's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164621):
- Interact while holding [Sellen's Primal Glintstone](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170410).

locations.title: Melina (East Raya Lucaria Gate)
locations.description:
**Location:** Appears when resting at the [East Raya Lucaria Gate](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164179) Site of Grace.  
**Quest:** Part of [Boc's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165122); speak with her about Boc here.

locations.title: Boc (Grand Library)
locations.description:
**Location:** Kneeling by [Rennala](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165895).  
**Quest:** Part of [Boc's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165122); one of the alternate endings.  
**Note:** From there, Boc can no longer be interacted with.

locations.title: D's Brother (Siofra)
locations.description:
**Location:** Near the [Prince of Death's Throne](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167604) Site of Grace.  
**Quest:** Part of [D's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167218). Speak with him, then reload the area to obtain the [Twinned Set](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168994) (again) and the [Inseparable Sword](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169172).

locations.title: Kenneth Haight (Throne Room)
locations.description:
**Location:** To the left of the throne, in [Stormveil Castle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164053).  
**Quest:** [Kenneth Haight's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164854)

locations.title: Nepheli Loux (Throne Room)
locations.description:
**Location:** To the left of the throne, in [Stormveil Castle](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164053).  
**Quest:** [Nepheli's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169124)

locations.title: Nepheli Loux (Library)
locations.description:
**Location:** In the library of [Roundtable Hold](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165686).  
**Quest:** Part of [Nepheli's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169124); she relocates here after step 2. Speak with her to receive the Arsenal Charm.

locations.title: Nepheli Loux (Downstairs)
locations.description:
**Location:** Down the stairs, by the fog wall.  
**Quest:** Part of [Nepheli's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169124); she relocates here after step 6.

locations.title: Patches (5th Location)
locations.description:
**Location:** On the wooden bridge before Elemer of the Briar.

Appears here after defeating [Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167571). Will give you the  [Dancer's Castanets](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=175929) after speaking with him.

**Quest:** [Patches' Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166248)

locations.title: Patches (4th Location)
locations.description:
**Location:** In the entrance corridor of the manor, before the room with Tanith.

Appears here after you join the Volcano Manor (unrelated to falling in his trap on Mt. Gelmir)

**Quest:** [Patches' Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166248)

locations.title: Rya (2nd Location - Alternate)
locations.description:
She will be there if you gave her the necklace from Blackguard at Liurnia of the lakes. Teleports you to Volcano Manor if you take her hands.

Only appears here if you arrive through [Ruin-Strewn Precipice](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165513) rather than the [Grand Lift of Dectus](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164180)

**Quest:** [Rya's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166813)

locations.title: Hyetta (5th location)
locations.description:
**Location:** At the very bottom of the [Subterranean Shunning Grounds](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=175442).  Get to the [Frenzied Flame Proscription](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168677) Site of Grace, then open the secret passage and descend the depths.   

**Quest:** [Hyetta's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169804)

locations.title: Rya (3rd location)
locations.description:
Down the hall from [Tanith](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167573), inside the room through the second door on the right.  

**Quest:** [Rya's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166813)

locations.title: Rya (5th location)
locations.description: **Quest:** [Rya's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=166813)

locations.title: Brother Corhyn (6th location)
locations.description:
**Location:** Kneeling, at the base of the giant spiral spear.  
**Quest:** [Brother Corhyn's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178950)

locations.title: Goldmask (Final location)
locations.description:
**Location:** On a cliff, west of the log bridge.  
**Quest:** [Brother Corhyn's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=178950).  
**Note:** After progressing the quest, visit the body to loot [Mending Rune of Perfect Order](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177441). Reload the area, then visit it again to loot [Goldmask Armor Set](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177442).

locations.title: Ensha
locations.description:
**Location:** [Roundtable Hold](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165686) - Near [Gideon Ofnir](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=169061).  
**Note:** After receiving either [Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167191) or [Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167291), he will turn into [an invader](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167506).

locations.title: Diallos (4th Location)
locations.description:
**Location:** ??  
**Quest:** ??

locations.title: Needle Knight Leda (First Meeting)
locations.description: Needle Knight Leda will be the first person you see before you jump into the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC. You can find her at the Mohgywn Dynasty Mausoleum in the Lands Between, which is located in the underground section of the map beneath Caelid.

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description: The ghost seems to be looking for Kenneth Haight, his lord that has been missing from the fort

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description: Speak to him and receive a hint about the [Tower of Return](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163981)

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description:
Sitting on the edge of the cliff by the [Rotview Balcony](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164372) Site of Grace.

_It's rotting. Everything, rotting scarlet. The very earth that Caelid rests upon, and Sellia, town of Sorcery. The end is nigh, for us all._

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description: On the left as you enter the lift chamber

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description:
Ghost just beyond the Liurnia Highway North Site of Grace.

"Ahh, the puppets..." "The puppets besiege us..."

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description:
Sitting on a small rock outside the ruin

_"Come out, one and all, from the darkness underground."_
_"And let us offer unto the maiden our eyes."_

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description:
Sitting outside the [Church of Pilgrimage](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163994)

"*The mausoleum prowls. Cradling the soulless demigod.*

*O Marika, Queen Eternal. He is your unwanted child.*"

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description: Nokron area

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description: "Let me see it, if only one last time. Your splendid blade, dancing amongst the scarlet rot"

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description:
Found sitting on the floor of the East side of Kingsrealm Ruins.

" Ah, Iji, forgive me. These royal grounds were placed in our trust, but we stood no chance.:

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description:
Ghost looking at the minor erdtree, saying
_"O Sapling! Sweet sapling of glorious gold. Has your crystal teardrop ripened?"_

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description:
"Maiden, dear maiden, where are you?
Please, take my grapes."

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description: On the small cliff, facing the erdtree.

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description: In the Church of the Eclipse

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description:
Just beyond the Site of Grace in the Windmill Village, amongst a broken wagon.

" Eek... I hear a festive melody... No, no, don't skin me... My hide is filthy, I swear."

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description: Lying in front of the fire

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description: Next to the entrance in the study hall

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description:
Add the edge of the cliff.
"...
Sublime, I tell you. 
The very first flower of Aeonia bloomed on this very spot.
Malenia, may you blossom into a goddess."

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description:
Sitting inside **Caria Manor**'s southwest room, under **Manor Lower Level** site of grace.

"Lady Ranni, we have long awaited you. I pray for your house's swift revival. May the full moon shine upon Caria."

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description:
Sitting on a stone, facing north. Just east of the Guide Statue.

...

Only ... a little further now...

Show met the path, O gentle lights ... the path to Elphael.

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description:
**Location:** Outside Deathtouched Catacombs.

"Unthinkable. Our hollowed resting place is violated. To refuse the Erdtree's call to return, to live within Death... Sickening."

This is a reference to the Blackknife Assassins' life

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description: **Location:** [Fort Gael](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164412) - After entering the castle through the backladder, cross the wooden beam, on the wall looking over Caelid.

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description:
**Location:** Stormfoot Catacombs, at the entrance, just in front of the site of grace.

_A proper death means returning to the Erdtree. Have patience. Until the time comes...and the roots call to you._

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description: _Heh heh... I'll survive, I swear it. I'll soon be back at Volcano Manor._

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description:
Sitting near a well at the Village of the Albinaurics Site of Grace.

"This village is done for. Please, even if it's just you, old Albus, hide well and still your breath."

locations.title: Ghost
locations.description: Above the cave of knowledge.

locations.title: Gurranq, Beast Clergyman
locations.description:
**Quest:** [Gurranq, Beast Clergyman's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=177161)

Only accepts Deathroot as currency for his wares, in this specific order:  
**Items:**
1. [Clawmark Seal](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168244)
2. [Bestial Sling](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168245)
3. [Bestial Vitality](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168246)
4. [Beast's Roar](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168247)
5. [Beast Claw](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168248)
6. [Stone of Gurranq](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168249)
7. [Beastclaw Greathammer](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168250)
8. [Gurranq's Beast Claw](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168251)
9. [Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=168252)

**Note:** After selling the 4th deathroot, he will become aggressive; you need to subdue him before he accepts further deathroots.  
**Note:** Part of [D's Quest](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167218); trade with him at least once to advance the quest.

**Tip:** Speak to [Nepheli Loux](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164904) in the courtyard until you exhaust her dialogue and she will aid you in the fight.

locations.title: Radagon of the Golden Order
locations.description:
**Location:** Within the Erdtree. He is part one of a two part final boss fight.   
**Loot:** None. Defeating him transitions straight into the fight with the Elden Beast.

locations.title: Elden Beast
locations.description:
**Location:** Within the Erdtree. It is part two of the final boss fight. It will automatically begin on defeating [Radagon of the Golden Order](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=176996)  
**Loot:** [Elden Remembrance](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=176995)   

**Note:** The Elden Beast is considered a God, with a unique message appearing upon defeat, "God Slain".

locations.title: Godrick the Golden Monument
locations.description:
*Godrick the Golden, humiliated*

*Having tasted defeat by the Blade of Miquella*

*Now on his knees, begging for mercy*

locations.title: Greatsword Monument
locations.description:
A large standing stone with an inscription about the siege of [Castle Morne](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=163951)
> *The siege of Castle Morne A lone hero fights for his vengeance Only to fall at the hand of Lord Godfrey*

locations.title: Lord Godfrey Memorial
locations.description:
On the side of the large sword 


*Lord Godfrey, at the end of his campaign*

*His golden armies unvanquished and unbowed*

*Yet finds grace lost, tattered and faded*

locations.title: Lore Stones (?)
locations.description:

> *The Battle of Aeonia Radahn and Malenia locked in stalemate Then, the scarlet rot blooms*

locations.title: Lore Stone
locations.description:
A large standing stone with an inscription:

The Second Liurnian War
No victory for the golden, nor for the moon
No prize for atonement; the birth of a vow

locations.title: Sword Memorial
locations.description:
*The resting place of the contemptible Cuckoos*

*Lost in the siege of Caria Manor*

locations.title: Greatsword Monument
locations.description:
*The Starscourge Conflict*

*Radahn alone holds Sellia secure*

*And stands tall, to shatter the stars*

locations.title: Greatsword Memorial
locations.description:
*The First Defense of Leyndell*

*A sovereign alliance rots from within*

*Traces yet remain of bloody conspiracy*

locations.title: Lore Stone
locations.description:
*The Routing of the Ancient Dragons*  
*Godwyn the Golden fought to the last,*  
*Earning the friendship of dread Fortisax*

locations.title: Sword Memorial
locations.description:
*The First Liurnian War*

*Radagon's glory burns red as his hair*

locations.title: Malenia's March Monument
locations.description:
*This mark Malenia's southward march*
*The Blade of Miquella and her Cleanrot Knights*
*Grant her wings never to be clipped*

locations.title: Lore Stone
locations.description:
Accessible by climbing up the ladders near the merchant

*The Assault on Volcano Manor*

*The squalid, the sick, the blasphemous;*

*a wretched, unending war with no glory*

locations.title: Sword Memorial
locations.description:
*The Second Defense of Leyndell*

*The Fell Omen stacks high the corpses of heroes*

*Yet the Erdtree remains unshaken*

locations.title: Lore Monument
locations.description:

_The War against the Giants Champions battle, trolls betray Fire vanquished, the era of the Erdtree begins_
